title: Profile work details
description: This mixin is used to capture information regarding person details in context of Business to Business contact.

xdm:ownerID.title: Contact Owner id
xdm:ownerID.description: The ID of the owner of the account associated with this contact.

xdm:accountID.title: Contact Account id
xdm:accountID.description: ID of the account thatâ€™s the parent of this contact.

xdm:deleted.title: Deleted Indicator
xdm:deleted.description: Indicates whether the contact has been deleted or not .

xdm:emailBouncedDate.title: Email Bounced Date
xdm:emailBouncedDate.description: If bounce management is activated and an email is sent to a contact, provides the date when the email was bounced.

xdm:emailBouncedReason.title: Email Bounced Reason
xdm:emailBouncedReason.description: If bounce management is activated and an email is sent to a contact, provides the reason for bounced email.

xdm:emailBounced.title: Email Bounced Indicator
xdm:emailBounced.description: If bounce management is activated and an email is sent to a contact, indicates whether the email bounced (true) or not (false).

xdm:leadSource.title: Lead Source
xdm:leadSource.description: Field recording what source the lead originated from.

xdm:contactStatusDetail.title: Contact Status Detail
xdm:contactStatusDetail.description: Additional Details of the current status of the contact.

xdm:originalReferrer.title: Original Referrer
xdm:originalReferrer.description: The original referrer is typically the page that leads to a form fill out.

xdm:originalSearchEngine.title: Original Search Engine
xdm:originalSearchEngine.description: Search engine that the original referrer used.

xdm:originalSearchPhrase.title: Original Search Phrase
xdm:originalSearchPhrase.description: Search phrase used by the original referrer.

xdm:emailOptOutReason.title: Email Opt Out Reason
xdm:emailOptOutReason.description: Reason for the contact opting out of recieving any emails if available.

xdm:phoneOptOutReason.title: Phone Opt Out Reason
xdm:phoneOptOutReason.description: Reason for the contact opting out of recieving any phone calls if available.
